fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fever, cough, shortness of breath, loss of taste or smell.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Respiratory symptoms with potential progression to severe respiratory distress.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Crackles on lung auscultation in severe cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Supportive care, antiviral therapy as indicated, vaccination
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Chronic fatigue, weight loss, opportunistic infections.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Progressive immune system failure caused by HIV.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antiretroviral therapy, prophylaxis for opportunistic infections
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of CD4 count and viral load
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Joint pain, skin rash, fatigue, renal involvement.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune disorder, more common in women.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Multi-system autoimmune disease with a wide range of symptoms.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Persistent cough, weight loss, night sweats, haemoptysis.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to Mycobacterium tuberculosis, living in or traveling to endemic areas.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Infectious disease primarily affecting the lungs.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor treatment response, adherence to therapy
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Joint pain, stiffness, swelling, symmetric involvement.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune disease, genetic and environmental factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring, adjust treatment as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Erythema migrans rash, fever, fatigue, joint pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Tick bite, outdoor activities in endemic areas.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Bacterial infection caused by Borrelia burgdorferi.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Dry eyes, dry mouth, fatigue, joint pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune disease, more common in women.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Immune system attacks glands that produce tears and saliva.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fever, chills, sweats, headaches, nausea, vomiting.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Travel to or living in endemic areas.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Parasitic infection transmitted by Anopheles mosquitoes.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Splenomegaly, pallor, jaundice in severe cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Antimalarial drugs based on species and drug resistance
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid mosquito bites, prophylactic medications for travelers
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: High fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, joint and muscle pain, rash.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Travel to tropical and subtropical regions.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Acute viral illness caused by dengue virus transmission through Aedes mosquitoes.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Rash, minor bleeding manifestations like petechiae.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Rest, hydration, antipyretics; avoid NSAIDs due to bleeding risk
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor for severe dengue, hospitalisation if necessary
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Mild fever, rash, conjunctivitis, muscle and joint pain, malaise.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Travel to or living in affected areas, mosquito bite.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Viral infection primarily spread by Aedes mosquitoes.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Symptomatic treatment with rest, fluids, and analgesics
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Prevent mosquito bites, consider testing in pregnant women
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Abrupt onset of fever, severe joint pain, muscle pain, headache, rash.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Travel to endemic areas, mosquito-borne transmission.

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Viral disease transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes.

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Joint swelling, rash, may have lymphadenopathy.

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Long-term joint pain management, vector control

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: High fever, headache, chills, muscle aches, vomiting, jaundice, red eyes, abdominal pain.

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to water contaminated by infected animal urine.

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Bacterial infection caused by Leptospira species.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid contact with contaminated water, vaccination of domestic animals
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Rapid onset of muscle weakness, numbness or tingling, difficulty walking.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Often follows respiratory or gastrointestinal viral infection.
fields.label: Social History

fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune disorder affecting the peripheral nervous system.

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor respiratory function, physical therapy for recovery

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fever, dry cough, difficulty breathing, malaise.

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Exposure to SARS-CoV, travel to affected regions.

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Viral respiratory illness caused by a coronavirus (SARS-CoV).

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Intensive care if necessary, follow-up for lung function
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fatigue, jaundice, abdominal discomfort, joint pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: More common in females, autoimmune predisposition.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic liver disease with autoimmune features.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular liver function monitoring, manage cirrhosis complications
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Most asymptomatic; fever, headache, body aches, skin rash, swollen lymph glands.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.defaultValue: Viral infection caused by West Nile virus.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Rash, lymphadenopathy; neuro-invasive disease may show neurological signs.

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Prevent mosquito bites, supportive care for severe cases
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Visual disturbances, muscle weakness, coordination problems, fatigue.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown; likely involves genetic and environmental factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic autoimmune disease affecting the central nervous system.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Abnormal neurological exam, including eye movement disturbances, limb weakness.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Joint pain and stiffness, skin rashes, nail changes.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Associated with psoriasis; genetic and environmental factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Swollen and tender joints, psoriatic skin lesions, pitting of nails.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Biologic agents targeting specific immune pathways
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular skin and joint evaluations, dermatology and rheumatology collaboration
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Chronic back pain, stiffness, reduced flexibility of the spine.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune disease primarily affecting the spine and sacroiliac joints.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Limited spinal mobility, tenderness at the sacroiliac joints.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular exercise, posture training, biannual rheumatology reviews
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Skin thickening, Raynauds phenomenon, joint pain, digestive issues.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.defaultValue: Connective tissue disease characterised by skin and organ fibrosis.

fields.defaultValue: Skin care, management of Raynauds, gastrointestinal symptoms
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of organ function, multidisciplinary care
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Mouth ulcers, genital ulcers, eye inflammation, skin lesions.

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown; thought to involve genetic and environmental factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Vasculitis that can affect multiple organs.

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Recurrent oral aphthous ulcers, genital ulcers, uveitis.

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Topical treatments for ulcers, systemic therapy for eye disease, vasculitis
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular dental and ophthalmologic exams, avoid triggering factors
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fever, fatigue, weight loss, muscle and joint pain, skin lesions.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can be primary or secondary to infections, medications, other autoimmune disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the blood vessels causing organ and tissue damage.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Palpable purpura, ulcers, gangrene in severe cases.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Long-term immunosuppression, monitor for organ involvement

fields.defaultValue: Frequent monitoring, adjust treatment based on disease activity

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Diarrhoea, weight loss, abdominal pain, bloating, malabsorption.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.defaultValue: Genetic predisposition; triggered by ingestion of gluten.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune disorder where gluten ingestion leads to small intestine damage.

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Dietary education, regular follow-up for nutritional deficiencies
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Widespread musculoskeletal pain, fatigue, sleep, memory and mood issues.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Aetiology unclear, often triggered by physical trauma, surgery, infection or significant psychological stress.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic disease characterised by widespread pain and tender points.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tender points without swelling or redness.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Lifestyle modifications, regular exercise, stress reduction
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe fatigue not improved by rest, impaired memory or concentration, sore throat, muscle pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Cause unknown; can follow viral infections.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A complex disorder characterised by extreme fatigue.

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Non-specific; may have lymphadenopathy, non-exudative pharyngitis.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Cognitive behavioural therapy, graded exercise therapy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe pain, swelling, changes in skin colour, temperature, and sensitivity in an extremity.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Often follows an injury or surgery.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A chronic pain disease affecting a limb.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Altered colour, temperature, and swelling of the affected limb.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Pelvic pain, pressure, discomfort in the bladder area, and frequent, urgent urination.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Cause unknown; may involve a defect in the bladder lining.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic disease characterised by bladder pain and urinary frequency.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Pentosan polysulfate, bladder instillations, pain management
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Jaw pain, difficulty chewing, clicking or locking of the jaw joint.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Causes include jaw injury, arthritis, or genetics.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A group of disease affecting the temporomandibular joint.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Pain or tenderness of the jaw, clicking sound on movement.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Pain relievers, oral splints, physical therapy
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Numbness, tingling in the hands and feet, sharp, burning or throbbing pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Diabetes, infections, exposure to toxins, and metabolic problems.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Damage to the peripheral nerves causing weakness, numbness, and pain.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Decreased sensation to touch, temperature, and vibration in extremities.
fields.label: Physical Exam
